author: ws
content:
LHD-6 Bonhomme Richard, is an older rankine cycle, steam turbine ship..

The latest ship in the Wasp class, LHD-8 Makin Island is a hybrid CODLOG combustion turbine, Diesel electric ship..

author: Peter Wright
content: And the Cutty Sark fire caused by a Hoover being left running. The culprit was reported as becoming “a bit of a hero” in creating a long term project for many about to be laid off upon completion of the original project.
